ownHttpClient

Class OwnHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ownHttpClient.OwnHttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OwnHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Esta clase es una implementacion de un cliente HTTP/HTTPS con manejo de cookies de forma transparente.
    See Also:
